thread.title: Mississippi man removes 140-POUND tumor from stomach | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Mississippi man removes 140-POUND tumor from stomach | Daily Mail Online

author: Forrest Hanson For Dailymail.Com
title: Mississippi man removes 140-POUND tumor from stomach | Daily Mail Online
text: Mississippi antique store owner undergoes surgery to remove 140-POUND tumor from his stomach that likely began as an ingrown hair Roger Logan, of Gulfport Mississippi, began putting on weight 12 years ago Doctors at first said that it was 'just fat' but later realized it was a growth that needed to be removed Logan became increasingly confined to an armchair and couldn't run his antique store His wife Kitty found surgeon in Bakersfield, California who could do the surgery Tumor successfully removed last week and Logan will be able to be active again
